website_summaries.verdict: These fantastically delicious little bars are really well-balanced.
pros: Higher fiber than many of the other bars on the market
Some of the highest marks for taste
16g of fat, 8g of fiber, 9g of protein and only 5g of net carbs in each bar
No added sugar or artificial preservatives, and made with organic almond butter, coconut MCT oil, and cacao butter
cons: You’ll pay for this better bar, as the price is a bit steep
They can melt easily if left out/heated

website_summaries.verdict: These keto bars have great taste and texture, but are definitely pricey.
pros: Each bar contains MCT oil, cacao butter, and almond butter with no added sugar
They have 5 net carbs and 16 grams of fat with a great taste and good texture
cons: These bars are definitely pricey and are also pretty small in size

customer_reviews.title: BAR IS HALF THE SIZE OF THE ORGINAL PACKAGE.
customer_reviews.text: These bars used to be SO good, which is why I've been ordering for months. Then something happened and they changed the whole formula so it doesn't taste nearly as good. But the worst part is that the bar is HALF THE SIZE OF THE ORIGINAL PACKAGE!!! THIS IS VERY DECEPTIVE ADVERTISING. This is such a shame because they used to be great bars, but now I never order from them again unless they go back to the original formula and an honest size that fits the package.
customer_reviews.author: Believe2achieve

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are like crack, about as expensive too (just guessing!). I look forward to my one bar "fix" daily.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Taste good, but too expensive...
customer_reviews.text: These taste pretty good and have a great nutritional breakdown for keto dieters. On the down side, they're pretty small, and quite expensive. At ~3$ per bar, I see these more as a rare treat than a practical addition to my diet.
customer_reviews.author: kjim

customer_reviews.title: All the bars were smashed before I even opened them.
customer_reviews.text: Product wasn’t even placed into a box. Just an envelope. All the bars were smashed and exploded and chocolate was leaking onto the outside of the package even before I opened it. It says product isn’t available for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer99

customer_reviews.title: this is by FAR one of the best next to some Keto friendly cookies I've had
customer_reviews.text: I have been on Keto for awhile now and I have to say out of all the "snacks" i've tried and tested, this is by FAR one of the best next to some Keto friendly cookies I've had, the good news with the bar however is it keeps you satisfied for a while. Great taste, no upset stomach or odd side effects and the texture is amazing, (great crunchy bits) Anyone on keto knows how hard it is to find a snack that is actually good for you on this diet, especially depending on the "Sweetener" they use. I ordered another box just to have them ready.
customer_reviews.author: Grave

customer_reviews.title: 2g Sugar, Use Stevia. Not a bad flavor.
customer_reviews.text: They are good, just don't hit the spot for me personally. Between Keto Bar and these, these have 1g of sugar more and more calories per bar. Still unsure of repurchase. I'm thinking someone out there must have something that doesn't use stevia (can't stand that taste) and has more flavor.
customer_reviews.author: NEflyer

customer_reviews.title: Went based on other reviews... yes, ...
customer_reviews.text: Went based on other reviews... yes, they are filling but I'm not to crazy about the taste... or the cost... Wish I could have found a smaller package to try them out first... ****Update 2/10/18- Since it was a large package... I kept eating them... I found that after refrigerating them- they tasted wayyy better AND now I actually crave them, especially with my coffee. With that said, I say, give them a chance, and then you'll get addicted!!! LOL #secondchance #greatproduct!
customer_reviews.author: MiR

customer_reviews.title: Not a winner with our employees
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these for our leadership team, as most are on a keto diet. Not one person liked these. I even left them out on the weekend, when our security guys come looking for snack, and even they complained. Not sure if we received a bad batch, but not well liked at all. Was told they were flavorless, of a horrible texture, and felt like eating Crisco.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Diaz - Celanese

customer_reviews.title: Good to go
customer_reviews.text: These are wonderful in my opinion. They need to be chilled (also my opinion) as the coconut oil can get a little messy. They are creamy, good flavor and not too sweet. I would buy these again even though they are a little pricey...it is worth it to be able to grab a snack when time is running short. Obesity is my issue and I am attempting to correct that. I needed something that would be filling but also quick. I love the flavor, it is mildly sweet, lovely texture and very satisfying. It helps with cravings also.
customer_reviews.author: Shery

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistency
customer_reviews.text: These arrived yesterday, so I’ve only eaten two. The first one was very bitter, like cocoa powder, and heavy. The second was a little lighter in texture and sweeter. They were different enough that I came back to see if I had ordered a variety box (which I didn’t). So my concern is that the nutritional value may vary from bar to bar. They are small but dense, like fudge, so they will fill you up. They don’t taste as good as an Atkins bar, but the macros seem much better for Keto. As long as they don’t cause a stall, I will continue to order them.
customer_reviews.author: GlennMarie

customer_reviews.title: Better texture when cold
customer_reviews.text: As always, Zenwise doesn't disappoint. Their product quality tends to be excellent. These Keto friendly plant based fat bombs are no exception. I prefer mine chilled, they taste and feel more like chocolate bars that way. Otherwise, when warm, the oils in the product result in a texture that is more like heavy grease and can make them a bit messy to eat. I typically break the bars into chunks before chilling them and eat them like finger food rather than as a bar. Though, if you are on the run, they are just fine right out of the wrapper.
customer_reviews.author: Golden Products

customer_reviews.title: The worst tasting bar ever.
customer_reviews.text: I got a box of these yesterday and ate one for breakfast this morning. These are terrible. It's not only the taste but the texture. The worst is when you bite into one of the cacao chips. I've eaten no sugar cacao for years and while it isn't sweet, it has crunch. These chips are like a bite of melted butter with no flavor. The smell is not pleasing either. Now I'm stuck with a box of these. I've eaten a bunch of Keto type bars and these are the only ones I don't think I can make myself eat again.
customer_reviews.author: rachel austin

customer_reviews.title: Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Love these bars except for price, but just ordered my second box. I think they are one of the best protein bars I have had bar none and I've tried many. But, most of all, they have healthy ingredients in them, and nothing harmful. I am extremely careful in reading labels and these are perfect including the nutrient counts for a KETO diet. If you like these you may want to try some of Dr. Mercola's too. I love his chocolate and double chocolate KETO bars too, so I order both of these. The only down size is they are both very expensive, but Dr. Mercola's are on sale right now so I ordered them too.
customer_reviews.author: IMHO

customer_reviews.title: Great tasting and super convenient
customer_reviews.text: These are a bit pricey (as is everything keto, though, right?) but they taste great and are a really convenient way to stay energized on the go. I try to save them for when I'm out during the day and I need something keto-safe that will give me the energy I need while being portable and easy wolf down between meetings, etc. Overall, very happy with these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Tastes a candy bar
customer_reviews.text: The flavor is great. It tastes similar to a candy bar. It’s better than most other nutrition bars I have tried. The consistency has a slight hint of butter when you bite into it and that’s why I didn’t give it a 5 in all areas. For being n the keto diet, I definitely recommend it. I have a real sweet tooth and it satisfied it. If it’s not satisfied, I will turn to the real stuff like actually candy bars, cookies, etc. Overall, I recommend you try it. I don’t think you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Pandora

customer_reviews.title: If you are new to Keto Get these
customer_reviews.text: When you are in need of something fast to get rid of your hunger or to get you going in the morning These are perfect... Although the taste isnt like a candy bar.... Its not bad at all... I received these on a hot day and they where melted but what do you expect. Put them in the fridge to get hard again the only thing that happened was the coconut oil surfaced and it was slightly messy on most of the bars.... big deal though you are working to lose weight and have to make certain sacrifices... This is perfect for chocolate cravings and to get a boost of energy
customer_reviews.author: ryan mcmahan

customer_reviews.title: My favorite keto protein bar!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. I keep the box in my car so that when I'm out and about, I always have something to keep me from getting hungry, which could potentially cause me to "cheat" off my keto diet. They are easy on the teeth (some that I had were very difficult to chew). I like the taste and texture, but don't expect them to taste totally delicious like a Snicker's bar or something - we are on a diet plan, and we are not allowed to have the things they use to create totally delicious treats.
customer_reviews.author: Verdant Treasures

customer_reviews.title: It's not too sweet, and has a great dark chocolate taste
customer_reviews.text: This is an ideal supplement to a Keto diet. It can serve as an occasional meal replacement when you are on the go, or eat half for an in-between meal snack, or I even use a bite or two as a desert. It's not too sweet, and has a great dark chocolate taste. My only wish is they were a bit more affordable, but outside that it's a great product to have around and has many different uses in a keto diet.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: OMG a must have on keto... So delicious!
customer_reviews.text: OMG a must have on keto... So Delicious! These were a high price point for something I was buying in the blind. I’m glad I took my chances. The flavor is much better than I was expecting. High quality ingredients and leave me feeling satisfied. I have a busy schedule and these are gonna make life so much easier to make sure I’m eating and getting my good fats in. Take the chance, buy them, you will not be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Darby

customer_reviews.title: So expensive but SOO good!
customer_reviews.text: These seem too good to be true but they are absolutely the most delicious Keto snack I have had the pleasure of eating. I purchased them reluctantly due to the price, but was very happy with the taste. Sweet, energizing and delicious. I wish they were cheaper but I will buy again for now and keep fingers crossed that they lower the price.
customer_reviews.author: LCF

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Keto snack
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th box that I have purchased and I have gotten all of my friends to become fans as well! As a avid Keto-er I am always looking for new snacks that not only give you what you need but are also delicious. They fit the bill for both! They are soooo delicious it’s almost like ordering desert! I highly recommend buying two boxes at a time because they do tend to sell out!!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a keto friendly bar that really is!
customer_reviews.text: I check my ketones and glucose everyday. This is one of the few food bars that allow me to eat something tasty when I am on the road and stay in ketosis. No other bars have the level of quality to fat ratio. This is a true keto friendly product. My only thing I would like is for the price to be a little lower.
customer_reviews.author: Bratton Fennell

customer_reviews.title: I like the texture and taste of this product
customer_reviews.text: I am a busy professional and wanting to stick to a keto diet but needing quick keto snacks as a go too when I'm at work. I like the texture and taste of this product. It has helped me stick to my diet and not crash at work. I have good energy and focus.
customer_reviews.author: T. Regan

customer_reviews.title: Keto products rarely taste as good as they suggest.
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever believed an ad saying "riced" cauliflower tastes "just like fried rice"? I'm finding this is a common overzealous comment about keto recipes and more frequently processed products like this one. It's OK. I'd use it as a chocolate bit if I was starving, but would not purchase again. In fact, after 1/2 of one bar, I threw the whole box in the trash. The texture is weird... mushy, the chocolate has the texture of overly processed chocolate mixed with oil. I'd rather have a couple of squares of a chocolate bar made with Stevia. I know where to get those...
customer_reviews.author: Anne Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: Hands down, undecidedly, the absolute best keto bar on the market.
customer_reviews.text: I've been doing paleo and keto for many years. This is by far my favorite bar. I've suffered through cases of bars that I struggled to even put in my mouth. Some of them which shall remain unnamed are so bad I can't even believe that people continue to eat them. This one is so delicious I have to keep myself out of them as an after-dinner dessert. Absolutely my favorite bar. Buy them by the case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super tasty
customer_reviews.text: I've tried all kinds of protein and keto bars, these are very tasty and not just for a keto bar. I would give it 5 stars but it's a little smaller than some other bars I like and it leaves a thick taste/texture in my mouth afterwards, not necessarily in a bad way but not always something I want. It's in my normal rotation for bars depending on what macronutrients I'm trying to hit that day.
customer_reviews.author: ~Astro~

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent, 1 great box, 1 awful box, like they rushed & didn't blend it well on the 2nd one.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first batch. They were evenly blended. Although expensive they were so good I bought 2 more boxes. The second batch I don't know what happened, but it's like chucks of unmelted bitter chocolate, and spots of Almond or coconut fats. This results in a much more bitter product, and given its price I will not buy again because it is inconsistent,and at this price should be exactly the same every time.
customer_reviews.author: Zebra mom

customer_reviews.title: Keto friendly, taste great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I started the Keto diet and was looking for a bar that would work on the go and meet my needs of good taste and low carb. This bar is such much better than the other low carb bars. It taste great, no after taste, buttery and chocolatey. Highly recommend them. The only thing I don't like is the price but if you think of it per bar it is not so bad. And half a bar at a time is very satisfying.
customer_reviews.author: Jillybean

customer_reviews.title: BEST Low Carb Bar!
customer_reviews.text: These protein bars are one of the best I’ve ever had! Delicious, filling and great nutrional numbers esp if you are doing low carb. They are pretty sweet, so if you are trying to satisfy a sweet craving this bar is for you! If you are wanting something more savory, this might not be the best. I’m going to watch Zenwise to see if they come up with more flavors (hint 😉).
customer_reviews.author: TexasSuz

customer_reviews.title: Tasty but tiny
customer_reviews.text: These bars have a creamy, fatty texture that is lovely. Tasty and truly crave-able. Unfortunately, I have never seen more misleading packaging! The bar is about 60% the size of the wrapper it comes in. Nearly all processed food comes in packaging larger than the product inside, but these Keto-Crave Bars are an outlier. With their price at the high end and their size at the low end, I would not call these a good value, but they are delicious.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Better than average
customer_reviews.text: You know what, these are pretty darn good. They're not as grainy or chalky as many protein bars, and that's probably because they have a higher fat content. They're actually truly keto, not just "low carb", because of the fat. Also, if you heat em up for a few seconds with a pat of butter they're really, REALLY keto
customer_reviews.author: Slathered in Gravy

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, chocolate chunks inside, keto friendly,... Score. Winning!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are really great tasting and hit the spot when you are having a sweet tooth craving. I had to get used to the texture at first, but after the first bar, I couldn't wait for the next one. They're even a bit addicting actually, and I like how it has little chunks of chocolate inside of them, it tastes delicious. I will definitely be purchasing again for sure and recommend them even if you aren't on a keto diet and just want a great snack bar.
customer_reviews.author: Muscle Whisperer

customer_reviews.title: Keto Snack Bar
customer_reviews.text: This product is actually very good and will alleviate hunger pangs for a long time. I only gave it 4 stars because the outer chocolate coating is a bit oily and can make a mess on your fingers (and your steering wheel if you grab this on the go).
customer_reviews.author: HollyHolly

customer_reviews.title: Good Keto Fat Product Bars
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these bars twice. It is like you are getting used to the taste at first when you are initially on keto diet. But now I am used to the taste, and these bars are a great snack food first thing in the morning or during the day.
customer_reviews.author: Irishsapphire

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me in Ketosis! FAVORITE protein bar
customer_reviews.text: These are SO GOOD! They're rich and creamy, not too sweet like so many protein bars, and keep me in ketosis! I also love that they don't have sugar alcohols. I was skeptical at first because they don't look like they taste very good lol but I think they're wonderful. Hands down my favorite keto snack but I love these even when I'm not doing keto.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Unicorn

customer_reviews.title: These are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome!!! I love the flavor and the chunks of chocolate chips in the them. I'm glad the almonds are in slivers and not huge chunks. Overall an AWESOME keto bar! Now to limit myself because I could totally eat another right now!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Misty Browning

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price. Taste is great!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious! Great for Keto. Taste was awesome. I would highly recommend these if you are having to track your nutrition for diet (specifically Keto diet) purposes.
customer_reviews.author: DW10

customer_reviews.title: these are good. if you are looking for a candy bar ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh boy, these are good. if you are looking for a candy bar look elsewhere. The directions say to eat 2 bars a day but sometimes I have an extra one.I’m trying to increase my fat intake without consuming a lot more food. These are filling. I will be buying more. For those complaining about the price cut back on Starbucks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A great way to travel keto...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a trip to the Rockies and since going keto regular trail mix just won't do. These bars traveled well and most importantly they tasted great and were easy to eat on the go. Great energy without the blood sugar spike.
customer_reviews.author: A. Vatke

customer_reviews.title: Good tasting bar but is very greasy & just half the bar in the pkg
customer_reviews.text: Way too greasy and its only half of the bar. The pkg the bar is in is twice the size. Bar tastes good but gets all oily and messy to eat if it get slightly warm(left in thw car or something).
customer_reviews.author: John D

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely yummy
customer_reviews.text: This has absolutely been the most miraculous find for me in my Keto journey. The chocolate cravings can absolutely derail you. This extremely delicious bar satisfies the chocolate cravings plus the nuts are an extra treat. I've shared this little gem with others I know that are eating this way for life. Wish you had more flavors but I'm grateful for this one!
customer_reviews.author: Queen Nzhinga

customer_reviews.title: But the Keto-crave bars are great. They are on the smaller size
customer_reviews.text: I have been on the Ketogenic diet for the last month or so. It has been a challenge to find a good-tasting low-carb energy bar. But the Keto-crave bars are great. They are on the smaller size, but they have a delicious fudgey-nutty flavor that I find very appealing. I reach for these bars when I am craving chocolate, or when I feel like a little dessert after dinner. I agree with another reviewer who said that they are more tasty cold, after being in the fridge. They are a very good option for those looking for a convenient, delicious, low carb bar when you are on-the-go!
customer_reviews.author: Hambone

customer_reviews.title: They arrived soft and kind of melted
customer_reviews.text: The bars were kind of melted when the order got delivered so they don’t taste good. Every bar that I have opened has melted chocolate inside the wrap Even though I don’t think eating previously melted chocolate is good, I still have been eating them since I paid so much for them. However, I will not buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: MelE

customer_reviews.title: like grass fed whey
customer_reviews.text: I needed a meal replacement/snack bar that fit my Keto lifestyle. There are many bars that do but none that had high quality ingredients, like grass fed whey, that taste good and are low in carbs. These are delicious and filling. I will purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rokovich

customer_reviews.title: Finally a great Keto bar
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried roughly a dozen different Keto snacks/bars and this is one of the few I’ve actually reordered. Others either have a strong artificial aftertaste or have no flavor at all. This one has a good flavor and a good texture. Just the right amount of sweetness for those with a sweet tooth and the macros are on point. A+
customer_reviews.author: Reem

customer_reviews.title: I bet these would be very good- but they arrived ...
customer_reviews.text: I bet these would be very good- but they arrived melted into liquid- so when they solidified again the flavor is totally off- would try again if they would ship with an ice pack.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I will buy again
customer_reviews.text: Good overall taste. Just started on keto so not used to the butter and fat taste, but quite satisfying knowing that you are eating lots of fat and still loosing weight. I will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: JoeK68

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Bars were defective, not mixed well, globs so white goo at base of bar with scattering of white throughout the bars. I called zenwise customer service to report twice, got a recording both times with no call back. These bars are way to expensive to have such poor customer service and quality
customer_reviews.author: Sparkler

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely awesome for following a KETO diet!
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious. Already ordered another box. The only downside is, they are so good, my husband who is not eating Keto is eating them too, UGH. I check my blood ketones after eating and I see I'm still in ketosis. Thank you for such a delicious snack.
customer_reviews.author: LMHERSH

customer_reviews.title: Dirt is more keto friendly...and tastes better
customer_reviews.text: I get it - bars aren’t supposed to taste good. Unfortunately, that sentiment is way outdated and there are plenty of bars on the market - many that aren’t loaded with carbs - that do. These are not part of that market. On top of being chalky, and tasting terrible, they’re not some super keto-friendly food. Complete waste as these went straight to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: It tastes really good nd I love eating them but I don't find ...
customer_reviews.text: It tastes really good and I love eating them but I don't find them to be filling, I seem hungry about an hour later. They also caused a lot of gas, not great for work. I don't think I can justify the cost of these.
customer_reviews.author: shoe gal

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these! I bought to take while hiking
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these! I bought to take while hiking, but unfortunately have eaten nearly all of them!! They are delicious!! They are expensive, but worth it in my opinion. Eating Ketogenic is amazing, and having this Keto-Crave bar handy to easily have a snack makes it easier. I buy hundred of things off Amazon and have never done a review. But I needed too for this product! Buy them - if you don’t love them like I do, ship them to me!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grunke

customer_reviews.title: Zen Awful
customer_reviews.text: I tried one bite and had to rinse and brush my teeth. I have never ever experienced anything so awful. Within a half hour my stomach was churning. The rest of the box was thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Birge

customer_reviews.title: I like the taste of these bars
customer_reviews.text: I like the taste of these bars, but the price has increased - again. Its now $3.33 per bar, currently ($39.99 per box). It's too much for a snack. Additionally, one small note is that the bar packaging belies the *actual* size of the bar, which is much smaller. I can't help but think that Zenwise is trying to make the bar look bigger than it actually is.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelleher

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: These taste very good but are very small. They come in a normal sized package but only take up about 60% of the space. Not a good value, but does taste good for a snack or very small dessert.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I'm new to Keto and struggling to find foods that I can eat on the go. These are very good and rich but also very expensive. The only problem I see with these is that I want to eat more than one :)
customer_reviews.author: Raemey

customer_reviews.title: A Good Low Carb On The Go Snack
customer_reviews.text: I often rely on protein bars, since I live a very active and on the go lifestyle. Therefore, I have tried almost every bar on the market, and I am always hard pressed to find a keto one that is low in net carbs. This bar definitely fits the criteria. It's not the best tasting one I've ever had, but it's pretty good all around.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Borrello

customer_reviews.title: Best of all the bars
customer_reviews.text: I'm always looking for healthy fast food out of all the bars this is my favorite this is coconut oil based instead of MCT powder which is better
customer_reviews.author: pnetmoney

customer_reviews.title: Delicious!
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious! On the Keto diet to battle brain cancer, these have great flavor, an excellent balance of fat vs carbs - perfect before or after a workout!
customer_reviews.author: Razor

customer_reviews.title: Very filling, very delicious
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a low carb protein bar that does not give you diarrhea! Everyone I've given a bite too has agreed that the taste is excellent. Very pricey for what they are, but also quite filling and delicious. Fantastic for an emergency snack.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Noriega

customer_reviews.title: I have no idea what they should taste like, what a waste
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT ORDER IN WARM MONTHS. They arrived liquefied with the summer and hardened into a crumbly, inedible blob in the bag. $40 in the trash. I have no idea what they should taste like, what a waste.
customer_reviews.author: Season Moore

customer_reviews.title: Great lunch bar
customer_reviews.text: I’m on a diet that uses shakes, but I have a schedule that doesn’t always allow me to make a shake at work. So, I pack a Keto-crave bar in the event I need a healthy lunch.
customer_reviews.author: W. Donovan

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty
customer_reviews.text: These were actually pretty tasty! They didn’t really give me any additional energy but a good pick me up to satisfy my sweet tooth
customer_reviews.author: Tasia M Gazdag

customer_reviews.title: HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.text: These bars are amazing!! I got the cacao almond flavor and they’re such a good, filling treat. The net carb count is amazing and they’re perfect for when you’re on the go and get hungry or for when you get want a sweet treat without having a carb overload. They do get melty so make sure they stay room temp or refrigerated! Highly recommend these bars. If you’re on the fence and unsure, do it. They taste amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Brock Walquist

customer_reviews.title: A tasty treat that keeps you full until the next meal
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes I get too busy to eat but if I skip a meal I over-eat at the next one - these bars are a quick grab and go that keep me filled up and satisfied until the next meal. Filling with just the right amount of sweetness to be a treat.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela R. Mackey

customer_reviews.title: These are pretty rich but are great of an on the go ...
customer_reviews.text: These are pretty rich but are great of an on the go keto meal. My first box were great, my second box was all melted when it arrived. All of the fat had melted out of the bar and was a huge mess every time I opened them. Lesson learned... don't order when the weather is supposed to be over 60 degrees. Lol
customer_reviews.author: lacey lovell

customer_reviews.title: Good when cold
customer_reviews.text: Pros: taste good when chilled, handy keto snack to keep in ur car/purse, and gives energy Cons: half my order was melted all over the box. Needs cold during shipping
customer_reviews.author: M.B. 29

customer_reviews.title: Bars are better tasting than others in the same category
customer_reviews.text: Bars are better tasting than others in the same category. They are a priced a little high and it took over a month to get them in once the order was placed.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Ratliff

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: Good for on the go and perfect for that sweet tooth urge. The taste is a tad bit lacking but it does the job. I eat mine with my coffee to mask the aftertaste. But happy to see KETO items hitting the market. Makes life easier.
customer_reviews.author: Masumi

customer_reviews.title: Mold!!! Gross
customer_reviews.text: Careful! Just opened a fresh pack and found mold growing inside the bar.
customer_reviews.author: HS

customer_reviews.title: A True Keto Bar that Tastes Great
customer_reviews.text: Besides taste, what I liked about this bar is that it did not use sugar alcohols, which can have a laxative effect.
customer_reviews.author: Louis McCall

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect. It hits all the notes
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely perfect. It hits all the notes. Need of a sweet or chocolate as you start the Keto diet? This product will satisfy! Delish. Waiting for new supply. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: igotravelin

customer_reviews.title: Super convenient and the taste is alright
customer_reviews.text: Super convenient and the taste is alright. Could be improved but it gives you the right amount of fat in a hurry to keep you in ketosis.
customer_reviews.author: lu1975

customer_reviews.title: These are ok nutrition wise, but the texture is ...
customer_reviews.text: These are ok nutrition wise, but the texture is not pleasant and the globs of fat in it are weird. Also, too expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Len

customer_reviews.title: I have to keep remembering that it is sugar free when downing one of these bad boys. This is by far the best tasting ...
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me!!?? Holy cow but this is a damn tasty keto treat. I have to keep remembering that it is sugar free when downing one of these bad boys. This is by far the best tasting keto bar out there, and I have tried a bunch. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rob from NY

customer_reviews.title: Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great with a really good texture as well. Reminds me of a softer quest that isn’t as sweet (which is actually a good thing). Just curious about more flavors.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Pellberg

customer_reviews.title: Keto Snacks!
customer_reviews.text: These bars were amazing snacks that are well needed for the keto diet. The only reason I give it a 4 and not a 5 is because the chicory in them gave me a lot of gas.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Sego

customer_reviews.title: Very tasty keto snack!
customer_reviews.text: These feel like cheating on my diet. So many keto snacks taste plain nasty. These are fantastic. A bit pricy but you get what you pay for. I’ll get more for sure. Keep em in the fridge too! Got the chocolate on others recommendation. Very good to satisfy the sweet tooth and chocolate craving.
customer_reviews.author: HonestOpinion

customer_reviews.title: Tasty!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone says stay away from bars on Keto but my lifestyle makes that really hard to do. These taste like a treat and are filling. They do not kick me out of ketosis and they don't make me crave carbs! Will definitely keep them around.
customer_reviews.author: M Baker

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Ok so they are expensive however once you try these bars you will be able to get past it quickly especially if you are on the keto diet. The bars are not like a protein or trail bar and need to be refrigerated or maintain room temperature.
customer_reviews.author: JTizzz

customer_reviews.title: I like the soft texture and taste of these bars
customer_reviews.text: I like the soft texture and taste of these bars. The sweetness is not too overpowering. I just wish it were a bit bigger. Otherwise, I’m pretty satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Keto Snack bar
customer_reviews.text: I very surprised by this product. I expected quality Keto fats and low total carbs, however the flavor is pure and rich.. The perfect balance of all things Keto
customer_reviews.author: Nick Borys

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor, healthy ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the flavor. I am quite picky since I cannot tolerate any artificial sweeteners or sugar alcohols. This is a clean bar with good ingredients that tastes very good. We use it as a treat instead of chocolate as well as a snack!!!
customer_reviews.author: consultant2014

customer_reviews.title: Overall a great bar...pricey though.
customer_reviews.text: I like it, but $3 is a bit pricey for a bar. Most alternatives I found are in the 22-30 price range (for a box of 12) which is more doable.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby B

customer_reviews.title: Love these! Great bar
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great bar! They make a great snack while on the go! Taste great with no gritty texture or funny after taste. I always have a couple tucked away in my purse! Highly recommend these for keto dieters.
customer_reviews.author: Karen R.

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good but a lot of gas
customer_reviews.text: In my experience these are the most tasty keto bars but unfortunately they also create the most gas - anything more than about 1/2 a bar generates this issue every time.
customer_reviews.author: Tania Alexander

customer_reviews.title: Not sure if the bars have changed
customer_reviews.text: I just bought a box after having ordered them previously and really liking them. I am not sure how this happened but it appears that each bar is half the size (inside the wrapper). I am not sure if the size has intentionally changed or if there is a problem with production. Maybe the ingredients were separated and the bars shrunk,not sure. I did refrigerate them because they were slightly melted.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Wagner

customer_reviews.title: Especially good for those who are always on the go and ...
customer_reviews.text: These are delicious! Will purchase again and again. Especially good for those who are always on the go and don't have time to sit down for meals.
customer_reviews.author: Fay Jung

customer_reviews.title: Great for those keto cravings we all get early on
customer_reviews.text: Tastes great. I can tell a lot of time and passion was put into the creation of this product. Only complaint is I wish there was 0 sugar.
customer_reviews.author: aus10

customer_reviews.title: Taste is awesome, rich and delicious!
customer_reviews.text: I am on the keto diet and needed a bar to take in my purse for when I needed food for lunch. I also was craving chocolate all the time and could not find a substitute without a lot of sugar. Wow,the taste is awesome, rich and delicious!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Melted in shipping
customer_reviews.text: They came melted so I had to refrigerate them and it was hard to get out of package.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Vaught

customer_reviews.title: Great taste, and healthy
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best tasting bars I’ve had. And it’s healthy. The bar is a bit small (210 calories), but I think it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff R.

customer_reviews.title: gained 2 lbs
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this , it is horrible , is like waiting fat from bacon when is hard , taste horrible and the fat that comes out is horrific. also I gained 2 lbs
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: Steady Energy
customer_reviews.text: I've been on a keto-diet for 3 months, and keto-crave has become a wonderful source of both fat via its ingredients, and a satisfying treat and/or meal. I like the taste, and find it gives me a source of steady energy for many hours.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Hudson

customer_reviews.title: They took a while to arrive but they are the best “keto friendly” bars that I have found
customer_reviews.text: Delicious bars! They took a while to arrive but they are the best “keto friendly” bars that I have found. I will be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: aodvm

customer_reviews.title: Breakfast bar for Keto
customer_reviews.text: Been eating these as a breakfast replacement, they aren't too bad. Better tasting than some other keto bar brands.
customer_reviews.author: Noisyturtle

customer_reviews.title: Yuck
customer_reviews.text: These things tasted awful.—like dried chalk that leaves a oily coating on the roof of your mouth. It is truly amazing how much awful flavor they can get in such a small, expensive package. If I could lick my scrotum, I would have, just to get the flavor out of my mouth
customer_reviews.author: Darren T. Loft

customer_reviews.title: They are tasty.
customer_reviews.text: I am following a Leto diet. The bars are very tasty and fill the need for something sweet. The texture is good and I like that they are very tasty. Some I have had before we’re not very good. These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Genell Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: I love the flavor and texture.  Super tasty.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor and texture is excellent. They make a great treat or a bar to take on a hike. I definitely feel full after having one.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fairman

customer_reviews.title: A great way to have a sweet snack without feeling guilty ...
customer_reviews.text: A great way to have a sweet snack without feeling guilty or blowing your diet out of the water. Good chocolaty taste, too.
customer_reviews.author: Mitch

product_meta.title: Keto Fat Protein Bar - Ketogenic Diet Snacks for Metabolism, Energy Boost & High-Performance - With MCT Oil, Cacao Butter & Organic Almond Butter - 5G Net Carbs - 12 Pack
product_meta.description: Size:1.48 Ounce (Pack of 12)ZENWISE HEALTH KETO-CRAVE is the perfect on-the-go dietary snack to sustain your ketogenic macronutrient intake. Featuring Coconut MCT Oil, Cacao Butter, and Organic Almond Butter, our specialized ketogenic formula promotes energy, physical performance, and metabolism to keep your body operating at peak performance, and pairs great with BHB beta hydroxybutyrate supplements.
feature_bullets: HEALTHY KETO DIET SNACKS - Zenwise Health Keto-Crave is a great-tasting ketosis friendly snack with natural and organic ingredients that support macronutrient intake for low carb, high fat diets.
PERFECT FOR YOUR KETO NEEDS - Keto-Crave bars contain 5g net carbs, 16g fat, and 8g fiber for people that care about ketones. Best of all, there's no added sugar, and pair well with BHB supplements.
PREMIUM INGREDIENTS, MAX RESULTS - These KetoBars contain MCT Oil, Cacao Butter, Organic Almond Butter, Grass Fed Whey Protein to promote increased energy for the body and mind to fuel fitness goals.

ON-THE-GO ENERGY & WEIGHT LOSS - Great for breakfast, lunch, or after dinner, these non caffeinated snacks provide energy with zero jitters, and support metabolism to promote fat burning weight control.

FOR BEGINNERS & ADVANCED DIETERS - These gluten free keto snacks are great for anyone dieters in need of a faster pre-workout solution. It's great for athletes, sports, weightlifting, biking, or running.
